title: Flip PDF Expands Capabilityies in Shareable Photo Book Designing
text:
Flip PDF is the digital publishing software which is compatible with different operating systems. Recently, it expands capability in shareable photo book designing. It achieves the digital photo book printing function for the convenience to cherish the best memories offline.
Flip PDF could remind people the best time of their memories by converting their PDF files into online photo books without the need of designers. The new page flip eBook can be ready in less than 10 minutes without the need of having special designing or coding skills. It takes only three simple steps to follow to create an eBook that behaves just like a paper book.
The various pre-designed templates, backgrounds, and themes allow users to choose whether to create a new brochure or a professional flipping magazine with flip sound and animations. More than 400 themes, 700 backgrounds, and 200 scenes can be downloaded using the online resources to create a unique photo book. It can be customized by changing colors, modifying the weight and height, to name a few of the dozens options available.
Flip PDF supports HTML5, so that the online photo books can be viewed on tablets and all other mobile devices. It is also the iPad photo album software which ensures smooth reading experience on iPad at any time. The photo book can also be used offline, keeping it on USB drives or CD/DVD. Also, it is easy to share via the social networks, like Facebook and Twitter.
The ready flipping photo book can be shared on the popular social networks or sent via e-mail. It also can be embedded into the websites to give the chance to visitors to see it or be exhibited in a free digital library.
